name: MX Bikes - Dirt Bike Games
description:
Mx Bikes is a realistic 3d motocross game which includes real physics, extreme stunts and mad skills.


All the power of Motocross in your hands, warm up your engines and get ready for the most realistic, exciting two-wheeled experience ever.

Get your dirt bike, helmet and hop onto your bike and go full throttle on your path to becoming a true Champion.


Your career results will affect game progression, so don't forget to upgrade your bikes and purchase new bikes to defeat the supercross champions.


Everything is so realistic in MX Bikes that it's easy to get confused. The iconic tracks, breathtaking rider suits, stunning helmets and remarkable dirt bikes are waiting for you.
Make your dreams come true, let your imagination run wild on the tracks, choose the terrain type and customize every aspect of your dream bike.


Mx Bikes lets you explore new landscapes and hone your riding skills.

Live the most authentic and immersive 2-wheels racing experience with new and improved features.
Mx Bikes take the fun of 2-wheels racing to a whole new level.

You can feel the real-life acceleration, torque, suspension and the thrill of off-road race.


Multiplayer mode in mx bikes is coming soon....
You can send us the suggestions and tips for multiplayer mode at contactgiantfish@gmail.com
